modmenu.summaryTranslation.locator_lodes: Adds Lodestones - and more - to the Player Locator Bar.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.locator_l:
Adds Lodestones - and more - to the Player Locator Bar.

Compasses, Recovery Compasses, Lodestone Compasses, Maps in your Inventory (including in Bundles) add Waypoints to your Locator Bar.
